page.title: 12Liverpool Newsham,Recreation
page.content: Many sports are catered for in our area. There is a number of public parks, 2 swimming pools, private sports ground and sports club. Watching and playing football are favourite hobbies. Everton F.C. training ground is within our area. The ice rink in Prescot Rd. is the only rink in Liverpool and is very popular with teenagers. Popular hobbies are; gardening, keep_fit, fishing, dancing, swimming, cycling, darts, snooker, boxing and crown green bowling. Children play many types of board games i.e. Scrabble, Monopoly, chess, draughts and Connect 4. However computer games and video games are gaining in popularity. Street games are still played.
